nodes.text: A village was located on the planet Bray, home to the native Brayans. After Lord Ravna began converting several Brayans to his species, the village's power was sabotaged. When the Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi and Adi Gallia arrived to investigate a distress call, they witnessed the village losing power, and discovered that it was being attacked by an infected mynock.
